reviews.text: Its a awesome place to spend an evening to relax your mind.
Charm, peaceful and enchanting place, also very good for mind relaxation.
So Charming place of worship...
Peaceful place to relax yourself. Good community.
A sacred Bodhi Tree which is situated inside the world famous Kalutara Bodhi Temple.

Nice attraction! Next to ocean or sea. The Town of  Galle in itself is very beautiful and worth exploring. Enjoyed my visit here! There is a very Beautiful Mosque near it and a nice halal Restaurant and also the legendary Galle cricket stadium is at a walking distance from this Fort. Galle Fort in itself is not a very big attraction but the ocean and the other nearby attractions and the cool breeze makes it worth visiting!

Nice attraction! Next to ocean or sea. The Town of  Galle in itself is very beautiful and worth exploring. Enjoyed my visit here! There is a very Beautiful Mosque near it and a nice halal Restaurant and also the legendary Galle cricket stadium is at a walking distance from this Fort. Galle Fort in itself is not a very big attraction but the ocean and the other nearby attractions and the cool breeze makes it worth visiting!

Good and Informative
This is a great attraction in south Sri Lanka though it will take you few hours to get here from Colombo. This is the place where the Europeans set up ancient ports. There are beautiful art statues. I recommend going here in the evening for sunset. If you come in the afternoon, beware it's too hot. Get a hat.
The city is almost like Europe with paved street and sidewalks. There are churches, museum and libraries nearby.

An old fort that you can walk around with great views and has been turned into shops and restaurants. Too bad they don't have the funds to keep maintenance up. Good stop over point. Not much information for visitors. It's a very hot walk but  there are plenty of restaurants to cool down in and have lunch etc. Worth a visit if you are in the area

Beautiful fort... can take about an hour to walk around it. Nothing much to do than enjoy the sights all around. Directly under the sun so stay hydrated and use good amount of sun block. Can see the Galle stadium at a distance.

Nice attraction! Next to ocean or sea. The Town of  Galle in itself is very beautiful and worth exploring. Enjoyed my visit here! There is a very Beautiful Mosque near it and a nice halal Restaurant and also the legendary Galle cricket stadium is at a walking distance from this Fort. Galle Fort in itself is not a very big attraction but the ocean and the other nearby attractions and the cool breeze makes it worth visiting!

There is a very Beautiful Mosque near it and a nice halal Restaurant and also the legendary Galle cricket stadium is at a walking distance from this Fort. Galle Fort in itself is not a very big attraction but the ocean and the other nearby attractions and the cool breeze makes it worth visiting!

I recommend going here in the evening for sunset. If you come in the afternoon, beware it's too hot. Get a hat.
The city is almost like Europe with paved street and sidewalks. There are churches, museum and libraries nearby.

Not much information for visitors. It's a very hot walk but  there are plenty of restaurants to cool down in and have lunch etc. Worth a visit if you are in the area

Beautiful fort... can take about an hour to walk around it. Nothing much to do than enjoy the sights all around. Directly under the sun so stay hydrated and use good amount of sun block. Can see the Galle stadium at a distance.

I thought this place was really cool! Maybe not the greatest place ever but certainly interesting and worth an hour of your time. The movie at the beginning was a little slow for my taste but the rest of the museum was definitely cool.
Liked the museum but the entry fee is more than the items inside. This museum consist of only 3 rooms consist of different fishing boats, 1 byrdes whale carcass
I find it cute and interesting. It is really cheap tickets and i guess is always important to support the culture and art of the places and learn about Galle Fort etc... recommended

Lot of great and educational stuff to see. Reminds you of the proud history we have had as a nation... Fabulous details and elaborations on each piece of exhibit must admire the effort in putting them together for people to read and understand..
Not really worth 1000 lrk entrance...go for few beers instead...you will use your money better...

Nice restaurant with good view of Old Town. Food was great, though the bottom sides of my fish fillets on the fish & chips were slightly soggy compared to the nice crispy top sides. Still good nonetheless. Also ordered the peel & eat shrimp as an appetizer. Nice big pieces of shrimp cooked perfectly. I could do with a little less of the buttery sauce that it sits in though. All in all, good food, good service - I'll be back.

So being from the Midwest we are not able to get fresh seafood usually. So when on one of the coasts, seafood is a must! Ordered the Fisherman’s platter, which had fish, shrimp and scallops with fries. All were good, but I felt the scallops were the best I’ve ever had! Not rubbery, very soft and tasty. Sad there were only two on the plate! All in all, this would have been a 5-star, except I felt the portion size was less than the price should have suggested.

Nice restaurant in Old Town. Good selection of dishes, service was friendly but nothing wowed me.  I would be happy to eat here again as I enjoyed the food but felt it could have been better executed.  I had the fish tacos and while the fish portion was very generous the other accompaniments felt a little overwhelmed.  It is a fish market so maybe it's just me?
The food was fresh and tasty. I had a big plate of mixed seafood. The crab cake and the grilled veggies was yummy. Atmosphere was nice and busy. Great selection of beers.

So disappointed with my small Captains plate for $26.00!!! I got two shrimp, one oyster, one scallop and a fish fillet.  I used to share the small platter!!! What happened???? I told the server that he should let customers know how small the portion is now!!!  The flavor was good and the rest of my party enjoyed their lobsters and Cobb salad or I would have rated it a 1.  This has always been one of our favorite places to bring out of town guests.

Away from the centre of the tourist zone is this 'neighbourhood' gem, which is run by the daughter of the founder.

Honest food at a reasonable price, with laidback service. They also do cocktails!

It's not the centre of gastronomic heaven, nor silver service waitstaff but the location, surroundings and price, make it a must visit.

I suspect - especially going by other reviews - standards can be patchy. We met the 'owner', who is a hardworking mum/cook/business owner. Tough gig.
1 hour wait. Food not worth that wait. Once it arrived the food was ok but a bit overpriced for what it was.
Dropped in for a quick lunch whilst visiting the Dutch Fort in Galle. Great BLT and decent mixed fruit juice.
The curry is absolutely amazing here! Best one I ever had

Fantastic restaurant
Homemade food
Excellent value for money
This place used to have a lovely rooftop terrace. Now it doesn't, and that makes me sad. 😕 Lovely avocado tho!
The food here is simply amazing! The food takes a little bit to be prepared but wow it is seriously the best meal we have had in a 3 week tour all over Sri Lanka! Wow!!!!!!
the MOST amazing mud crab curry!!! as in, MOST ... have it. it is delicious. service is slightly slow but thats because they make the food fresh!

The restaurant is an arts cafe, adorned with paintings and wall art. The food menu is basic, but the taste is great! They could do with slightly better service. I would highly recommend it to anyone. It is also moderately priced by Old Fort Standards.

Thai chicken salad consists of lettuce, chicken and Thai sweet chilli sauce and that's it. But that was the better dish. The prawn curry made an unfortunate return that evening. It was very quiet there so can only assume the prawns weren't as fresh as they should have been.

love this hotel by the seaside. able to catch a really nice sunset and sip a cup of coffee. rooms are large and spacious and equipped with a nice bath tub for relaxation. a complete enjoyment. nice large restaurant with a wide variety of food. will love to be back one day.

Mesmerizing view, amazing sea spray and truly colorful ambience in different Day parts and that is just a glimpse of the Jetwing Lighthouse. Visited this place for couple of hours with RB colleagues but loved this place and hope to come back again.

Loved staying at jetwing, the staff, the food, the setting, everything was perfect. The rooms were to a high standard and clean throughout. Entertainment in the evening was great and happy hour made it even better :) - will definitely be staying again!

The rooms were fabulous. Clean and up to date.   Each had a room with a balcony and a mini garden! (Conveniently close to the pool and beach) More than this the service was outstanding. The service at the Anchor bar by the private pool in the courtyard were super. As was the check-in staff and housekeeping. Everyone had a smile on and obliged us in every way,  allowing us to have a great family vacation.
Great place to relax and unwind. Highly recommended

love this hotel by the seaside. able to catch a really nice sunset and sip a cup of coffee. rooms are large and spacious and equipped with a nice bath tub for relaxation. a complete enjoyment. nice large restaurant with a wide variety of food. will love to be back one day.

Mesmerizing view, amazing sea spray and truly colorful ambience in different Day parts and that is just a glimpse of the Jetwing Lighthouse. Visited this place for couple of hours with RB colleagues but loved this place and hope to come back again.

Loved staying at jetwing, the staff, the food, the setting, everything was perfect. The rooms were to a high standard and clean throughout. Entertainment in the evening was great and happy hour made it even better :) - will definitely be staying again!
